question: Can u tell me how the inheritance will be distributed according to the following scenario
answer:
QUESTION

Can u tell me how the inheritance will be distributed according to the following scenario:

Husband dead leaving behind wife, one son, one daughter with one parent of father, one brother and two sisters and both parents of wife and one brother and 4 sisters.
Wife dead leaving behind husband, one son, one daughter and rest of all above relatives as in 1.
Both husband and wife dead leaving behind one son, one daughter and rest of all relatives as in 1.
ANSWER


Share:

 

 

The heirs in all three queries are not clear. The statement “….with one parent of father …” is not clear. You also refer to this in queries two and three.

 

 

According to our understanding, in the first instance the deceased was survived by a wife, son, daughter, father, mother in law, father in law, brother in law and sister in law. If this understanding is correct, the estate will be divided into 72 equal shares as follows

 

 

Wife                                       9 shares

 

Son                                         34 shares

 

Daughter                               17 shares

 

Father                                     12 shares

 

The mother in law, father in law, brother in law and sister in law do not inherit.

 

 

In the second instance if the deceased was survived by husband, son, daughter and father, the estate will be divided into 36 equal shares as follows

 

 

Husband                                9 shares

 

Son                                         14 shares

 

Daughter                               7 shares

 

Father                                     6 shares

 

The in laws do not inherit.

 

 

In the third instance if the deceased was survived by a son, daughter, and father, the estate will be divided into 18 equal shares as follows

 

 

Son                                         10 shares

 

Daughter                               5 shares

 

Father                                     3 shares

 

 

And Allah Knows Best

 

 

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
